description_for_human: AI-only React component library with 240+ production-ready components. Search, browse, and retrieve TypeScript components optimized for AI code generation.
description_for_model: HubLab is a comprehensive component library specifically designed for AI assistants including ChatGPT, Claude, Grok, and Copilot. Use this plugin to search and retrieve production-ready React components with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. The API provides semantic search, component examples, pre-built templates, and full metadata. All components are optimized for AI consumption with detailed descriptions, tags, and usage examples. Supports function calling for dynamic component discovery. Use /api/ai/capsules to search components, /api/ai/examples for implementation examples, /api/ai/templates for complete templates, and /api/ai/metadata for library information. Perfect for real-time web app generation and code assistance workflows.
